results.input: After graduating from MIT in 2015, I joined Facebook. Then in 2018 I moved to Stripe, and last year I started my own company. My name is Alex Rivera.
results.reason: The 'name' and 'years' fields are correct, but the 'company' field is wrong as it repeats the name instead of identifying the new venture, and 'title' is acceptable but lacks context due to the company error.

results.input: I've been in the industry since the iPhone was first released. Currently leading infrastructure at Netflix. - David Kim
results.reason: The output correctly extracted the name 'David Kim' and company 'Netflix', and the title relates to 'infrastructure' and 'lead', but it failed to calculate the years of experience (should be around 17-18 based on the iPhone release in 2007).
